abstract: Study in The Journal of Environmental Studies and Sciences reports starvation is serious threat during extended pandemic as food distribution networks break down, but it is hard to predict when and where food shortages will begin.
lead_paragraph: Researchers at EcoHealth Alliance used mathematical models to gauge the effects of an outbreak on the distribution of food.

headline.print_headline: Timeline of Starvation During a Pandemic

snippet: Researchers at EcoHealth Alliance used mathematical models to gauge the effects of an outbreak on the distribution of food.

keywords.value: Journal of Environmental Studies and Sciences
